function.name: lightEffect-turnOff
function.description: This function is used to turn off the light effect function of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the light effect.

predefinedLightEffect.description: The specific light effect function to be turned off (e.g., gradual turn-on, gradual turn-off).

groupAction.description: Whether the action applies to a group of devices.
